snippet: Work force resistance, entrenched regulatory regimes and a stagnant regional economy are among impediments confronting managers of Europe’s legacy airlines.
abstract: Strike by French pilots at Air France-KLM is emblematic of challenges facing all sorts of European businesses as they try to become more internationally competitive; managers of Europe's legacy airlines are having to deal with work force resistance, entrenched regulatory regimes and stagnant regional economies as they seek to revive their perennially unprofitable businesses.
lead_paragraph: Work force resistance, entrenched regulatory regimes and a stagnant regional economy are among impediments confronting managers of Europe’s legacy airlines.

headline.main: Air France Strife Shows Challenges for European Business
headline.print_headline: Air France Travails Emblematic of Challenges for European Business
